snippet.title: Using the cloud to reduce your global risk
snippet.description: Companies are seeking new solutions for managing risk as they link in worldwide suppliers. Cloud can help when internal systems cannot.

snippet.title: 10 things we learned in 2010 that can help make 2011 better
snippet.description: The beginning of a new year is a good time to consider how well we met the previous year's challenges and to use what we learned to make improvements in the months to come.

snippet.title: New Microsoft initiative will use computing to attack global problems like volcanoes and oil spills
snippet.description: On Monday, Microsoft announced a new focus on high-end distributed computing to help solve global problems and serve as a testbed for Microsoft's cloud OS.
